name: Obliterator (itch)
description:
Controls :

UP Arrow / W / LeftJoystickUP / Joystick A = Accelerate.

Down Arrow / S / LeftJoystickDown / JoyStick B = StopShip.

Move Mouse / Rotate RightJoystick = Aim and rotate ship.

Mouse LeftClick / Joystick LB/RB = Fire.

How to play :

When you click on play, it start a 30 sec round. You have to aim at bright red/orange star, and shoot at them to explode them.

Every star exploded give you some score, some money and some seconds more to the round.

Once the round is over, you can purchase upgrades in the Customize shop from the main menu, using your money.

Try to get the best HighScore.
